title: Syria, Impeachment, Doral & 2020
itunes:title: Syria, Impeachment, Doral & 2020
description:
Kevin spoke wit Louise Schiavone, Journalist and Senior Lecturer at Johns Hopkins University Carey Business School and Tyler Pager, Bloomberg News National Political reporter. They discussed Trump's impeachment saga, the situation in Syria, Trump's announcement that the next G-7 summit will not be held at a Trump resort in Florida, and the 2020 elections.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
